europeana:record.dc:title: Late Cretaceous-Early Palaeogene echinoderms and the K/T boundary in the southeast Netherlands and northeast Belgium - Part 1: Introduction and stratigraphy
Scripta Geologica
europeana:record.dc:creator: Jagt J.W.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Echinodermata
Late Cretaceous
Early Palaeogene
localities
stratigraphy
europeana:record.dc:description: In a series of papers describing Late Cretaceous and Early Palaeogene echinoderm faunas (exclusiveof holothurians) of the Maastrichtian type area, the present contribution comprises a detailed accountof the litho- and chronostratigraphy and biozonations of these deposits, and of localities from whichthe echinoderm material to be described stems. In subsequent papers reference will be made to thisintroductory part.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Late Cretaceous-Early Palaeogene echinoderms and the K/T boundary in the southeast Netherlands and northeast Belgium - Part 1: Introduction and stratigraphy (URN:ISSN:03757587) (Volume 116)
